    1: import pytest
    2: 
    3: import pandas as pd
    4: 
    5: 
    6: class TestResolution:
    7:     @pytest.mark.parametrize(
    8:         "freq,expected",
    9:         [
   10:             ("Y", "year"),
   11:             ("Q", "quarter"),
   12:             ("M", "month"),
   13:             ("D", "day"),
   14:             ("h", "hour"),
   15:             ("min", "minute"),
   16:             ("s", "second"),
   17:             ("ms", "millisecond"),
   18:             ("us", "microsecond"),
   19:         ],
   20:     )
   21:     def test_resolution(self, freq, expected):
   22:         idx = pd.period_range(start="2013-04-01", periods=30, freq=freq)
   23:         assert idx.resolution == expected
